page.title: 01TOURISM : A GUIDE TO YATTON
page.content: Yatton is a dormitory village for Bristol.It is a ribbon development and the centre is based around the precinct.Here there is a supermarket, shoe shop and newsagents.There are also shops along the High Street at both ends.On the outskirts there is Cadbury Country Club.Here there is a swimming pool,sauna,adventure playground,bar and restaurant.Most people work in Bristol because there is no main industry in Yatton. There is easy access to places like Bristol because we have a railway line.Yatton is very dependent on the railway. There are several pubs where you can get good food and drink.There is also a church and some chapels.Yatton is a quiet,friendly village.
